UD_ModOutcome_Scene
Scriptname UD_ModOutcome_Scene extends UD_ModOutcome

Plays scene

NameFull: Scene

Parameters in DataStr (indices relative to DataStrOffset property): [+0]  Int  Force Default value: 0 (False)

Form arguments: Form2  Scene to play or FormLists with scenes (a random scene from the merged list will be started)

Form3  Scene to play or FormLists with scenes (a random scene from the merged list will be started)
